name: Mr Bread (Jam Version)
description:
This game is a sh!t post game don't expect a triple A level of a game , this game was made in...I didn't count the days and hours , but its playable at least c'mon now!

Controls:

Unless you never saw or touched a keyboard before here's the controls:

W -> Move  Forward

A -> Move Left

D -> Move Right

S -> Move Backward
